## Technology Stack

| Category | Technologies |
|----------|--------------|
| **Runtime** | Node.js 18+, TypeScript 5.3+ |
| **Testing** | Jest 29.7 |
| **MCP** | @modelcontextprotocol/sdk 1.0 |
| **AI** | Anthropic SDK, LangChain |
| **Browser** | Playwright Core 1.57 |
| **Monitoring** | Prometheus, Grafana, Loki |
| **Infrastructure** | Docker, n8n |
